product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Fleece Hoodie - Women's
long_description: Keep your cool and stay dry as you work hard in the women's adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Fleece Hoodie. It also offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Made from activated carbon from recycled coconut shells, Cocona(R) is a natural technology applied to fabrics and yarns to accelerate evaporative cooling and manage odor. Cocona treatment will not wash off or wear out. Elastic binding at hood opening and cuffs ease on/off. The adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Fleece Hoodie offers zippered hand pockets. Adjustable hem seals out weather.
short_description: Keep your cool and stay dry as you work hard in the women's adidas Terrex Swift Cocona Fleece Hoodie. It also offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection.
